title: How to Make Apple Spice Mini Muffins

steps.headline: Make the batter in a large bowl.
Add the mixture to a pre-greased mini muffin pan, about 2/3 full.
Bake the muffins for 17 to 20 minutes.
Allow to cool completely on a wire rack.

text:
Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC. Make the batter in a large bowl. Use a hand or stand mixer to beat the butter and sugar together. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/19/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/19/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Whisk in the eggs. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/87/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/87/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Add the baking powder, baking soda, and spices. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a7/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a7/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet3-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Integrate the flour and applesauce into the bowl by adding about half at a time alternatively. Continue mixing everything until just mixed through. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5d/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5d/Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Apple-Spice-Mini-Muffins-Step-2Bullet4-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Add the mixture to a pre-greased mini muffin pan, about 2/3 full. Bake the muffins for 17 to 20 minutes. Allow to cool completely on a wire rack.
